name: Defend the Forest
description:
O forest spirit, grant  thee strength to defend the forest shrine!

W, A, S, D - Move
Click - fire spirit orb
Right click - move turret

Created for weekly game jam 117. Kept going back and forth on submitting or not until I had only 2 days to implement an idea I got over the weekend. Give it a play and let me know what you think!
